price: Aquellos que furtivamente alcancen a oír algo de los ángeles serán alcanzados por una centella fulminante.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
